com.neovisionaries.bluetooth.ble.advertising

Class Flags

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neovisionaries.bluetooth.ble.advertising.ADStructure
      • com.neovisionaries.bluetooth.ble.advertising.Flags
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Flags
extends ADStructure
    An AD structure of type Flags (0x01).

    The format of the AD data is described in "1.3 FLAGS" in "Core Specification Supplement v5".

    This class was renamed from ADFlags to Flags when the version was upgraded to 1.4.

    See Also:
    Specification Adopted Documents, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Flags

        public Flags()
        Constructor to create an instance with length=2, type=0x01, and data={0x00}.

      • Flags

        public Flags(int length,
     int type,
     byte[] data)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of the AD structure. The value should be data.length + 1.
        type - The AD type. The value should always be 0x01 (Flags).
        data - The AD data.
